attributes.action: Introduce a more proportional voting system
attributes.additional_details: Options might include switching to the Single Transferable Vote or Party List systems of Proportional Representation. See: http://www.electoral-reform.org.uk/voting-systems
attributes.background: The current Conservative government is the most unrepresentative of the vote in British history. The British people have demonstrated their dissatisfaction with the status quo through the Brexit vote. It is essential that the post-Brexit government is elected more proportionately.
